import { useState } from 'react' const AddExam = ({ onAdd }) => { const [text, setText] = useState('') const [score, setScore] = useState('') const [diff, setDiff] = useState('') const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!text) { alert('Please add an exam') return } onAdd({ text, score, diff}) setText('') setScore('') setDiff('') } return (
setText(e.target.value)} />
{/* setScore(e.target.value)} /> */}
{/* setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)} /> */}
) } export default AddExam
